SEARCH
Package it.polimi.common.messages

Class NormalOperations

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.common.messages.Operation
it.polimi.common.messages.NormalOperations
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NormalOperations extends Operation
The NormalOperations class is a message used to notify the operations to the worker node. It contains the list of operations, the list of files, the change key flag and the reduce flag.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • NormalOperations

      public NormalOperations(String programId, List<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.MutablePair<String,String>> list, List<String> pathFiles, boolean changeKey, boolean reduce, Integer identifier)
      The constructor creates a new NormalOperations.
      Parameters:
      programId - represents the program id.
      list - represents the list of operations.
      pathFiles - represents the list of files on hdfs to process.
      changeKey - represents if the changekey operations is present or not in the list of operations.
      reduce - represents if the reduce operation is present or not in the list of operations.
      identifier - represents the identifier of the worker for a specific program.

  • Method Details

    • getChangeKey

      public boolean getChangeKey()
      The getChangeKey method returns the change key flag.
      Returns:
      the change key flag to indicate if the change key operation is present or not in the list of operations.

    • getReduce

      public boolean getReduce()
      The getReduce method returns the reduce flag.
      Returns:
      the reduce flag to indicate if the reduce operation is present or not in the list of operations.
